screego/server

Screen sharing for developers

View on index

Related repos

  • Multiplayer framework for Node.js with SDKs for Web, Unity, and more
  • web-based collaborative terminal for sharing sessions
  • browser-based screen sharing with WebRTC and Go
  • peer-to-peer chat, calls, docs, kanban, whiteboard, no server needed
  • Streams screen to browsers over network
